news.headline: You Should Give These 2 Wall Street Winners a Closer Look
news.summary: Stocks largely took a breather on Wednesday, although that didn't stop the Nasdaq Composite (NASDAQINDEX: ^IXIC) from inching higher to post yet another day of gains.  The S&P 500 (SNPINDEX: ^GSPC) also saw small gains, while the Dow Jones Industrial Average (DJINDICES: ^DJI) was the sole loser among the most-followed indexes.  Axon Enterprise (NASDAQ: AXON) and Roblox (NYSE: RBLX) saw their shares move sharply higher after reporting solid financial results for the just-ended quarter.

news.headline: Axon (AXON) Q3 Earnings Increase Y/Y, 2023 Guidance Bullish
news.summary: Axon's (AXON) Q3 results benefit from strength in Axon Cloud software, demand for Axon Fleet systems and the ramp-up of TASER 10 and Axon Body 4. The company improves its 2023 guidance.

news.summary: Axon stock rose past a buy point on the strength of its big Q3 earnings beat fueled partly by sales of its new Taser 10 weapon.
